name: Time to Expiration (<45 days)
description: This PromQL query measures the time remaining before the expiration of certificates that are set to expire within the next 45 days.
question: How much time is left before certificates expire within 45 days?

description: This PromQL query measures the time remaining before the expiration of certificates that are set to expire within the next 45 days.

name: Time to Automatic Renewal (<45 days)
description: This PromQL query measures the time remaining before the certificates are automatically renewed, specifically targeting certificates that have less than 45 days until renewal.
question: What is the remaining time before certificates are automatically renewed?
